embeds.title: 📚 Guild & Discord Resources
embeds.description: Curated tools and links to help Compulsion’s officers manage the guild and community with clarity, efficiency, and flair.

fields.name: 🛡️ World of Warcraft Guild Tools
fields.value:
[Guilds of WoW](https://guildsofwow.com/) – Syncs Discord with in-game data for recruitment, events, and logs.
[Guilds of WoW Discord](https://discord.com/invite/guildsofwow) – Official support server with updates and tips.
[Wowhead Discord Directory](https://bing.com/search?q=Discord+resources+for+World+of+Warcraft+guilds) – Class, spec, and community server list.
[WoW Guild Server Template](https://discordtemplates.me/templates/1096800564639187044) – Prebuilt layout for guilds.
[Guilded WoW Server List](https://bing.com/search?q=Discord+resources+for+World+of+Warcraft+guilds) – Discover guild servers using Guilded.

fields.name: ⚙️ General Discord Resources
fields.value:
[Discord Resources Wiki](https://discordresources.com/) – Massive list of bots, guides, and utilities.
[Essential Channels Guide](https://discord.com/community/channels-every-community-server-should-have) – Must-have channels for community servers.
[23 Features Every Discord Server Needs](https://slurptech.com/discord-features/) – Moderation, embeds, anti-nuke, and more.
[Discadia Server List](https://discadia.com/?q=%23general) – Browse and promote servers by category.
[Discord Channel Ideas](https://superprofile.bio/blog/channels-discord-ideas) – Engagement-focused channel inspiration.
